dict.string: Our app does not request this permission or utilize this functionality but it is included in our info.plist since our app utilizes the react-native-permissions library, which references this permission in its code.
We will use camera feature to provide a communication between users, the purpose is only for communications and we will not use your image to any other purpose.
We will use microphone to make a call between users only with the purpose of communication and to provide a better experience to the users.

We will save photos in your photo gallery and retrieve the same photos from your photo gallery to enable image share in chat feature. It will make easier for you to send informations to your contatcts.

Our app does not request this permission or utilize this functionality but it is included in our info.plist since our app utilizes the react-native-permissions library, which references this permission in its code.
